body_html:
Thanks @ezyang for the detailed analysis. Given that you mentioned we do many more insertions than lookups, are there hash maps optimized for that? I chose the ska::flat_hash_map for the dispatcher because there's many more lookups than insertions.

Possibly from here: https://our.intern.facebook.com/intern/wiki/Hash_Tables/F14/

body:
Thanks @ezyang for the detailed analysis. Given that you mentioned we do many more insertions than lookups, are there hash maps optimized for that? I chose the ska::flat_hash_map for the dispatcher because there's many more lookups than insertions.

Possibly from here: https://our.intern.facebook.com/intern/wiki/Hash_Tables/F14/
